survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Car Wash Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding contactless car wash services, including service quality, pricing, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless car wash services?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users by frequency of use. Ensure answer options are clear and cover the full range of possible responses.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless car wash services?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a contactless car wash service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify key decision drivers. Include an 'Other' option to capture unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice (checkboxes), include an open-text field for 'Other' responses.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing a contactless car wash service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall quality of the contactless car wash service you most recently used? (1 = Very Unsatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'This is my first time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons), display only if Q1 is not 'This is my first time'.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the overall quality of the contactless car wash service you most recently used? (1 = Very Unsatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'This is my first time' in Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements, if any, would you suggest for contactless car wash services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements, if any, would you suggest for contactless car wash services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the contactless car wash service you most recently used to others?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any option except 'This is my first time' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice (radio buttons), display only if Q1 is not 'This is my first time'.
